text: Reminder: INBOUND 2021 starts today! Come join us: <https://www.inbound.com/>
Is it just me, or is the ‘No More Cookie Cutter Marketing’ session lagging quite a lot?
Nvm, just do not have too much tabs open
No such thing as too many tabs. (I'm kidding i often have 40 + and forget which tabs i already have open, so i open more.)
Hahaha, this is so relatable.
I missed out on the “no more cookie cutter marketing” session - it started at 6AM for me, I didn’t wake up early enough. Sounded like a good talk though, Marketing in a cookieless world and all that

Some sessions today that may interest developers:
• <https://join.inbound.com/s/recZFtWUPBVyo8n8v|Killer SEO Strategies Through Product Design Methodology> at 8:15am (CDT)
• *<https://join.inbound.com/s/recN4VMf2C15FlGCg|HubSpot Spotlight>* at 9:30am (CDT)
• <https://join.inbound.com/s/recEx9Gl1z2Ftb3AM|AMA on SEO, Leadership and Career Building With Kevin Indig, Director of SEO at Shopify> at 12pm (CDT)
• *<https://join.inbound.com/s/recvOVKtf5yb6J4bZ|The Benefits of Curating Content to Your Audience>* at 2PM (CDT)
• <https://join.inbound.com/s/recYBW3NYvy9sxxKa|Debate: The Epic Debate of Booking Demos - Long Live Forms! or All Hail Chatbots!?> at 2:45 pm (CDT)
• *<https://join.inbound.com/s/recGrmiCaE2YooqXH|Finding your inner voice - Hasan Minhaj>* at 4pm (CDT)
If you have powerhouse pass and missed it like I did you can watch it on demand later:
• <https://join.inbound.com/s/recwZZvQMafi5af38|No more cookie cutter marketing> - about GDPR and doing marketing without browser cookies
This list is absolutely not all encompassing, there may be content interesting to you that I didn’t list. See the <https://join.inbound.com/agenda|full agenda>, and save all the sessions you intend to attend.

I’ll be posting a list of sessions like :this:  in this channel each day - that I think are interesting to devs each day of #INBOUND2021

I’ll also do my best to give a heads up before the Spotlight talks start.
<https://join.inbound.com/s/recMdJWCyGTkHEG75|The start of leaving a legacy - with Clynt Marshall, CEO of Dallas Mavericks> starts in ~15 minutes.
thanks <@U7SL518D6>!
Good morning everyone :slightly_smiling_face:
Hi!
It took me way longer than I’m proud to admit but finally found my avatar walking around the virtual INBOUND grounds.
Still looking... is everyone in the same corner?
I don’t think so, my guy was walking around by the chess board. Think he moved all over the place. I lost em.
Reminder the <https://join.inbound.com/s/recN4VMf2C15FlGCg|HubSpot Spotlight> starts in 15 minutes.
Reminder: The <https://join.inbound.com/s/recN4VMf2C15FlGCg|HubSpot Spotlight> is starting NOW!
I dig the Pyjama principle
Only Dharmesh would kick off a big conference with “The underpants gnome effect”
Is the network a new thing? never heard of it before

Sorry what part were you specifically talking about?

I got distracted for moment and think I missed something.
I think he was talking about this Jon.  <https://network.HubSpot.com/>

Reminder: The HubSpot Theme Challenge is back again. Build website themes for HubSpot’s marketplace to compete for a Tesla and over $100,000 in cash prizes. Learn more at <https://HubSpot.devpost.com/>

Reminder: All live sessions are being recorded, if you miss one you it will appear later in the on demand library if you have a powerhouse pass. <https://help.inbound.com/article/4-live-sessions|https://help.inbound.com/article/4-live-sessions>
ahh, yes it’s new
still in beta in fact
I only travel to the office to play ping pong. IDK what everyone else is there for. lol
Web 3 - Decentralization
User Generated Content?
sounds a lot like Headless CMS now ...

No, not exactly user generated content. Think your data (including user generated content), your website content etc can be decentralized. As Dharmesh stated this is not a statement about HubSpot product timelines.
yes i know, it just sounded like it to me :slightly_smiling_face:
Go Nancy GO!
:developers-developers-developers:
“we’re offering a sandbox that’s a very production like environment”
Does the new? sandbox sync feature include CMS content? Can I sync with my dev site?
Checkout the features they’re talking about at <https://www.HubSpot.com/new>
Customer Portal - built on the CMS :thinking_face:
in this something like the knowledge base that is "built in" in  HubSpot or can this be customized more?
i recently had a customer tell me that she does not understand why the knowledge base cant be customize the way other parts can be
It’s more like an area a customer could log into to access to their outstanding tickets
I’ll pass along the feedback about KB customization though
So yes it’s related to Service HuB but it does not replace the Knowledgebase
Payments only available in the US for now and in beta right?
thanks <@UFBNA9K9A>
Hey Sajeel, that is correct.
"Its about buyer empowerment not seller enablement"
Got too sucked into what she was saying to quote keep quoting
that is true for a lot of CMS topics as well
“Customer Relationship Magic System” - Brian quoting Dharmesh.
Got it AJ! Hope you're good
I am doing well Sajeel, I hope all is well with you also!

“unsung heroes with capes”
I don’t think Yamini was talking about my dog, but it was an excuse to post this:
“Care deeply, persevere relentlessly” Yamini Rangan on solving for customers, partners, and building HubSpot as a place employees can love and be proud of.
The email myths busted session is unexpectedly humerous <https://join.inbound.com/s/rec77hy8oQ8rSnVPR>
what other sessions have folks been attending, what’d you think?
Spotlight: *<https://join.inbound.com/s/recvOVKtf5yb6J4bZ|The Benefits of Curating Content to Your Audience>* starts in 15 minutes.
Could HubSpot payments be the first step to full e-commerce functionality in HubSpot? Would love to have some more tools to build my first e-commerce site in HubSpot.

You can read up on the details of HubSpot Payments here
<https://www.HubSpot.com/products/payments>
Read all about it! So excited. Can't wait for HubSpot to add more payment options.
But first have to wait untill it is available in the Netherlands
True-fact. Continuously refreshing your browser does not make your next session start earlier.
I may or may not have run the experiment to validate that, myself.
Can not wait to discuss all this during Developer Day
Spotlight: *<https://join.inbound.com/s/recGrmiCaE2YooqXH|Finding Your Inner Voice>* with Hasan Minhaj starts in 15 minutes.
It's a good first step for sure! More countries, currencies, types of products etc.  Good bones though!
Loving Hasan's spotlight! He's a great speaker!
I loved his bit about “I got fired from everywhere, Del Taco……” then “I went to the comedy club and asked if I could do my time.”
He’s also being genuine and sharing what motivates him so while he’s funny it’s authentic too
Yeah, he's one of my favorite comedians. Saw him in person on a whim in 2017 and I'm so glad I did

If anyone missed Hasan Minhaj, and wanted to check it out, it should be available on demand for powerhouse pass folks. (may take a lil while for the recording to process) <https://join.inbound.com/s/recGrmiCaE2YooqXH>
See y'all tomorrow for another great day of INBOUND!

Whole lot more sessions for Day 2, here’s my list of ones that may be interesting for developers. It’s a lot longer today, I swear I tried to condense it.
• *<https://join.inbound.com/s/recRGe3uzvAQV7rsd|Breaking into uncharted territory - Tristan Walker>* at 8AM (CDT)
• <https://join.inbound.com/s/recIvhaJ9Zs8aGjUK|Delivering a more connected customer experience with payments> at 8:30 am CDT - you might notice a friendly face from our community - <@U25C65C3S> 
• ~*The possibility of a greener future* at 9:30 am (CDT)~ Dennis Woodside of Impossible Foods is unable to join us today and his session has been cancelled and removed from the agenda.
• <https://join.inbound.com/s/recJDzCnEIPEteCQh|Suit Up Superheroes! How AI Supercharges Revenue Teams> at 10:15am (CDT) - this content may be geared more towards sales folks, but may still be interesting to developers.
• *<https://join.inbound.com/s/recU087EPBsMtormj|Social Responsibility at Scale>* with <https://www.inbound.com/2021/speakers/sarah-paiji-yoo|Sarah Paiji Yoo> at 11 AM (CDT)
• <https://join.inbound.com/s/recuQf0q4IgOy5AW7|Using Behavioral Science To Improve Customer Success> at 11:30 (CDT)
• *<https://join.inbound.com/s/recjXzJSlpdx58EX6|The Power of Growing Pains>* with Kelly Watkins, CEO of Abstract at 12pm (CDT)
• <https://join.inbound.com/s/recm5Etmr9tPMUIV0|Meetup: For Start-up Developers Wanting to Discuss AI and ML> at 12:15pm (CDT)
• <https://join.inbound.com/s/recaWzjYjYG0iXEdz|Debate: Content Marketing Clash - Video v. Podcasting for Engagement> at 12:45pm (CDT) [I know we have a few podcasters in our community]
• <https://join.inbound.com/s/rec2SFadeRoBndnyS|Designing Inclusive Digital Content> with Alyssa Smith of AudioEye at 1pm (CDT)
• <https://join.inbound.com/s/recNLDeC4CunTxkpK|Rise of the RevOps Developer> - with Connor Jeffers of Aptitude 8 at 1pm (CDT)
• <https://join.inbound.com/s/reckZtJvNK8KJxmsv|Trusted Content: 7 Steps to Becoming the Most Trusted Voice in Your Space> at 1:45pm (CDT)
• <https://join.inbound.com/s/recslnzddRQrovKdJ|Debate: What’s More Important & WHY - Email Subject Line v. Email Content> at 2:45PM (CDT)
• <https://join.inbound.com/s/recGg65CC8OhG2uCe|RevOps in Real Life: A Case Study, With Operations Hub> - with Kyle Jepson of HubSpot at 3pm (CDT)
• <https://www.inbound.com/2021/sessions/deep-dive-part-2-wholly-shift-a-new-conversation-about-unconscious-bias-discrimination|Deep Dive Part 2: Wholly Shift: A New Conversation About Unconscious Bias & Discrimination> at 3pm (CDT)
• *<https://join.inbound.com/s/rec8bLds2ekcEvAAz|Drawing Ambition Out of Yourself and Others>* at 4pm (CDT)
• <https://join.inbound.com/s/rec1U2caPMJAQGKJl|Transitioning To Content Marketing 2.0 With Video Podcasting> at 4:45pm (CDT)
This is just my handpicked list, there are a whole lot more sessions that might interest you. Full list is at <https://www.inbound.com/2021-agenda>
<@U7SL518D6> I get tired just looking at that agenda :slightly_smiling_face:
haha, well - it’s the busiest of all 3 days. What can I say?
